page.title: 15Tutbury general info [con`t]
page.content: Many years ago there were ten or more tennis courts,three howckey teams,a netball team and cricket and soccert teams.Now there is only a cricket team left.Tutbury is not a market town anymore.It has become popular and busy and also something of a tourist attraction so it is pleasing to hear news of a by-pass for the village in 1987. THE CASTLE Overlooking the village are the ruins of a Norman Castle which is over 800 years old.It is a tourist attraction because it is associated with famous people of the past like Mary Queen of but today it is also used for camping, fetes, carnivals and mock battles. the curator has found many items of historical interest including cannon balls and bones and there are rumoured to be ghosts, such as a white lady.
